name: Notify_User
description: Sends an In-org notification message to a set of users optionally linking to a target record

title.description: Short title of the notification. Default:

targetId.description: Salesforce Id of the record to link to. If there is none use '000000000000000AAA'

recipientIds.description: Comma separated list of Salesforce Ids of the users to send the notification to. Defaults to Current User Id
